name: O Two
description:
Briefly about the game itself (demo).

For us, this project was primarily a kind of test subject for experiments and learning in our business. So you can clearly see that some things such as..... the game itself is underdone to the desired consistency.
The mechanics in the game itself are balancing indicators with a small plot.

What can be distinguished is that in General, the space turned out to be quite good, and even interacts well with the mechanics of the balance of indicators.
But much of it is in need of significant improvements.
Well, the benefit of errors do not climb out, and the game does not crumble. 

P.S. if you do not have an old calculator. Older PCs may not have the right firewood.

 At least we managed to make a working demo in the crumbs of time that we had with our experience. Even so, I'm thrilled with what we've done.
We also plan to bring it to mind in the future, as we finish with the normal work on order for another game.
